context: Toast, Inc. is a restaurant technology platform focused on point-of-sale, payments, and operations software for restaurants. Restaurant platform leader. Competing with Square, Clover.

competitors.name: Square for Restaurants
competitors.notes: Market leader with 25.56% share in POS systems. Well-known POS option for small cafes, food trucks, and quick-service restaurants. Offers free plan with essential features, making it attractive for new businesses. Strong presence in both retail and restaurant markets.

competitors.name: Lightspeed
competitors.notes: Comprehensive restaurant POS known for powerful back-end features, particularly in inventory and multi-location management. Ideal for restaurants scaling up or wanting deeper operational control. Higher learning curve but strong feature set for fine dining and multi-location operations.

competitors.name: Clover
competitors.notes: Flexible POS system with 6.21% market share. Accepts more payment options than Toast with customizable features and wide range of hardware options. Custom-build capability with extensive third-party apps and integrations. No contract requirements unlike Toast.

competitors.name: TouchBistro
competitors.notes: iPad-based POS focused on restaurant-specific needs. Intuitive, mobile-friendly solution ideal for food trucks, pop-ups, and casual dining restaurants. Strong offline functionality and affordable pricing.

competitors.name: SpotOn
competitors.notes: All-in-one solution combining POS with marketing, loyalty, and reservation tools. Excellent for full-service restaurants looking to enhance customer engagement and retention.

competitors.name: Revel
competitors.notes: Strong POS system designed for restaurants with multiple locations. Competes in the enterprise and multi-unit restaurant segment with robust features.

competitors.name: Retail Sales Manager
competitors.notes: Second-largest competitor in POS systems category with 13.70% market share, though primarily focused on retail rather than restaurant-specific solutions.

competitors.name: HungerRush
competitors.notes: Specialized POS system designed specifically for pizza restaurants and fast food chains. Strong in delivery-dependent businesses.

competitors.name: UpMenu
competitors.notes: Emerging competitor ideal for restaurants focused on online ordering, delivery, and marketing. Strong digital-first approach.

competitors.name: Restaurant365
competitors.notes: Restaurant management and accounting software that competes in the back-office management and financial operations segment.

competitors.name: Lavu
competitors.notes: iPad-based restaurant POS competing in the mobile POS segment for restaurants.

competitors.name: Petpooja
competitors.notes: Restaurant management platform competing in the broader restaurant technology space.
